threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message:
G3H - 12.5
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMP - 12.5
PPDCIN - 16.8
PP3V42- 3.3
PPVRTC - 3.3
PP5V_S5- 5
PP5V_SUS- 5
PP5V_S3 - Missiing

Checked thoroughly. No sign of any type of damage.

Thank you in advance. Have a good one.

threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message:
U7200

pn1 Fluctuates 
pn2 Fluctuates 
pn3 2 V 
pn4 3.3 
pn5 2 
pn6 .7 
pn7 3.3 
pn8 3.3 
pn9 7.8 
pn10 3.3 
pn11 3.3
pn12 fluctuates
pn13 3.4
pn14 2
pn15 0
pn16 12.5
pn17 5
pn18 Fluctuates
pn19 Fluctuates
pn20 0
pn21 0
pn22 4-9V Fluctuates
pn23 0-3.3 Fluctuates
pn24 0


Should I try replace this? It seems to be working for 3 V rails just not 5. Thank you.

threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message:
If the fan spins 5V must of course be present at some point. Heck ALL_SYS_PWRGD needs to be present for the fan the even spin. So the board is doing a lot more than you just reported.
Is CPU Vcore coming on when the fan is spinning?

threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message: Thanks for the response. I am home now. Will check when I get in, in the morning. Have a good one.

threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message: All_SYS_PWRGD is at 3.1 - 3.3 when the fan kicks on, then drops to 0. Thanks.

threads.title: 820- 2936, fan spins for a couple seconds then reboots.
threads.message: Could be anything. CPU is not talking to U7400 to enable it. Inspect board for missing/damaged parts. R7402 is a common suspect, but as I said could be anything. BIOS is also possible.....anything.
